description: The High Commission of Canada to Kingston, in Jamaica requires landscaping services for its Chancery (CH), Official Residence (OR) and one staff quarter (SQ).
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Landscaping and Grounds Maintenance Services for the High Commission of Canada in Kingston, Jamaica
### Solicitation Number 24-246432

#### Tender Description

* The High Commission of Canada to Kingston, in Jamaica is soliciting proposals for Landscaping and Grounds Maintenance Services for its Chancery, Official Residence, and one staff quarter accommodation located in Kingston, Jamaica.
* The services include a range of daily activities such as flowerbed maintenance, lawn mowing, tree and shrub care, and palm tree maintenance for the Chancery (approximately 6,350 sq. ft.), Official Residence (approximately 5,850 sq. ft.), and staff quarter accommodations (approximately 1,860 sq. ft.).

#### Service Requirements

* The successful Bidder will be required to provide personnel, materials, supplies, labor, supervision, tools, equipment, and other items related to the services as described in the tender document.
* The Contractor is exempt from providing specialized equipment and materials that are not readily available in Jamaica.

#### Tender Information

* **Tender Reference Number:** cb-362-76336424
* **Solicitation Reference Number:** 24-246432
* **Closed Date:** 2023-11-14T14:00:00
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada
* **Contact Information:** 
   * Name: Nancy Levasseur
   * Email: internationalproposals@international.gc.ca
   * Phone: (343) 203-0000

#### Important Notes

* Proposals must be submitted by the tender closing date to be considered.
* The Government of Canada reserves the right to reject any or all proposals in whole or in part.
* The successful Bidder will be required to comply with all relevant labor laws and regulations in Jamaica.

#### Mandatory Attachments

* For additional tender information and requirements, please refer to the sole-sourced document: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21935/24-246432---landscaping-and-grounds-maintenance-services---rfp.pdf
